# Termites
## The dataset
Ingroup taxa belonging to the *Reticulitermes* termite genus and one outgroup, the closely related *Coptotermes formosanus*
```
>Reticulitermes_urbis

>Reticulitermes_balkanensis

>Reticulitermes_lucifugus

>Reticulitermes_grassei

>Reticulitermes_virginicus

>Reticulitermes_flavipes

>Reticulitermes_chinensis

>Reticulitermes_flaviceps

>Coptotermes_formosanus


```
The alignment:
- 9 OTUs
- Lenght: 711 bp
- 16S ribosomal RNA

Now let's add some more sequences
```
>Reticulitermes_hageni

>Reticulitermes_nelsonae

>Reticulitermes_santonensis

>Drosophila_albomicans

```
Look at the alignment, what happens?
